definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in S. Arabia;—only c. [[ה]] loc. [[סְפָ֫רָה]] Ge 10:30, LXX Swfhra; usu. indentif. with Ṭ̄afâr (z.afa0r, pronounced 0’s.fa0r, 0’sfa0r acc. to Thes), ancient city of Ḥimyarite kings (Ptol. Sapfar mhtro/poliv v. Sprenger:Aite Geogr. Arab.:§ 301 et pass.), so Thes Tuch:Comm. Ge 2, 212, but dub. Glaser:Skizze ii. 437, [[ס]] = [[ח]] improb. Di:ad loc. Lag:BN 61.
